mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry(inquiryno, memberno, inquiryTitle, inquiryReason, contentsno) VALUES(inquiry_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryReason}, #{contentsno})
mapper.select: SELECT inquiryno, memberno, inquiryTitle, inquiryReason, contentsno FROM inquiry ORDER BY inquiryno ASC
